about_the_game:
Sacrifices is a story-driven exploration game that delves into the complexities of a mother and child navigating the challenges of 1980s suburban life. Players will step into a world tinged with the nostalgia of a bygone era, captured through a lens of retro VHS aesthetics.

As the protagonist, you're a child witnessing the daily struggles and sacrifices of a single mother working tirelessly to provide a better future. The gameplay intertwines routine activities with emotional depth, allowing players to engage in the seemingly simple tasks that build the narrative's foundation.


FEATURING:
A twisted, and engaging narrative that gradually unravels itself over the course of the experience.
An experience where you uncover and interpret the story as you play.
The power of deciding the story's progress. (multiple endings)
